trending.title: Injured Balogun dropped from U.S. Gold Cup squad
trending.description: Forward Folarin Balogun will miss the Concacaf Gold Cup because of an ankle injury and was among three players dropped Sunday from a United States roster already without Christian Pulisic and Weston McKennie.

trending.title: Lone fan greets Inter after PSG humiliation
trending.description: A lone fan is reported to have been the only one to greet Inter Milan at the airport after their defeat to PSG in the Champions League final.

trending.title: Beckham criticises on-tour Man United players
trending.description: Manchester United legend David Beckham has said he has been disappointed by the behaviour of the squad during their postseason tour of Asia, saying he sees "a lot of things that are not acceptable."

trending.title: Dou√© beats Yamal to Champions League award
trending.description: Paris Saint-Germain winger D√©sir√© Dou√© beat Barcelona's Lamine Yamal to win the Champions League Young Player of the Season award.

trending.title: PSG bus parade overshadowed by fan deaths
trending.description: PSG's open-top bus parade to celebrate winning the Champions League was overshadowed by the deaths of two people and some 200 injuries during overnight parties.

updates.title: Bonmat√≠: Why Spain can now match England, U.S.
updates.description: Spain and England face off on Tuesday for a place in the UEFA Women's Nations League final four.

updates.title: Man United officially lands Wolves star Cunha
updates.description: Manchester United have agreed the signing of forward Matheus Cunha from Wolves pending visa and registration processes, the club announced on Sunday.

updates.title: D-backs pull ace Burnes in 5th with possible injury
updates.description: Arizona Diamondbacks ace Corbin Burnes was lifted after just 70 pitches Sunday against Washington with an apparent injury.

updates.title: Rockies' lows: 10th sweep; 3rd fastest to 50 L's
updates.description: The Rockies (9-50) have been swept 10 times in 20 series this season and are the third-fastest team in MLB history to the 50-loss mark.

updates.title: Russell: 'Unnecessary' Max crash felt deliberate
updates.description: George Russell said Max Verstappen's move on him felt deliberate and suggested the four-time world champion is a bad example for kids watching Formula 1.

updates.title: Springer out after 3rd-base hop, ending Jays' rally
updates.description: Blue Jays outfielder George Springer inadvertently hopped into an inning-ending out in the fifth on Sunday against the Athletics.

updates.title: üçø Pacers troll Knicks after NBA Finals berth
updates.description: The Pacers didn't hold on back on the Knicks after winning the Eastern Conference title.

updates.title: Stark wins the U.S. Women's Open for first major
updates.description: Maja Stark continued the steady play she had demonstrated all week to win the U.S. Women's Open and claim her first major championship Sunday at Erin Hills.

updates.title: Wright St. ousts No. 1 overall Vandy from regional
updates.description: Wright State held off Vanderbilt in the ninth to knock the No. 1 national seed out of the NCAA tournament with a 5-4 victory in the Nashville Regional on Sunday.

updates.title: Honest Alcaraz concedes point before advancing
updates.description: Carlos Alcaraz called on himself for breaking the rules during his fourth-round win over Ben Shelton at the French Open.

updates.title: Sources: Batt agrees to deal as Michigan St. AD
updates.description: J Batt, who has served as athletic director at Georgia Tech since October 2022, agreed to a six-year deal to be the next AD at Michigan State, sources told ESPN.

updates.title: Verstappen's petulance overshadows excellence in Spanish GP
updates.description: Max Verstappen is among the greatest drivers in F1 history, but that legacy is being tarnished by his temper.

updates.title: Luis Enrique honors late daughter after UCL final
updates.description: Paris Saint-Germain manager Luis Enrique honoured his late daughter, Xana, by planting the French club's flag on the pitch after winning the Champions League final.

updates.title: Buffalo Bills QB Josh Allen ties knot with actress and singer Hailee Steinfeld
updates.description: Allen and Steinfeld tied the knot on Saturday after a six-month engagement.

updates.title: Panthers-Oilers II: Key stats to know for the 2025 Stanley Cup Final
updates.description: For the second consecutive season, it's Florida-Edmonton. Here's what you need to know before Game 1.
